channel.title: Machine learning on DevRa
channel.description: Recent content in Machine learning on DevRa

item.title: Image clustering
item.description: Clustering is a technique to group similar elements together. The following shows a simple program codebase is a small attempt to cluster colors in images. At the heart of the program lies the K-Means algorithm. The source is available at github.com/rafed/Image-clustering. Original Averaged - 2 clusters Averaged - 6 clusters Look at the “original image” above. There are pixels of many different colors.
